samples.question: So how long have you had your current hairstyle?
samples.transcript: I have been maintaining this hairstyle, for about a year. After my, dispatch in the military service. And yeah, I am enjoying this haircut since I do not need to put on a lot of wax and a lot of hair products. And when I put on hair products, then, it does not feel so good for me. that is why I am enjoying this hairstyle right now. Okay, good, good.
samples.transcript_original: Uh, I've been maintaining this hairstyle, uh, for about a year. After my, uh, dispatch in the military service. And yeah, I'm enjoying this haircut since I don't need to put on a lot of wax and a lot of hair products. And when I put on hair products, then, um, it doesn't feel so good for me. That's why I'm enjoying this hairstyle right now. Okay, good, good.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I have been maintaining this hairstyle, for about a year. After my, dispatch in the military service. And yeah, I am enjoying this haircut since I do not need to put on a lot of wax and a lot of hair products. And when I put on hair products, then, it does not feel so good for me. that is why I am enjoying this hairstyle right now.

samples.question: And have you ever had an unhappy haircut experience?
samples.transcript: During my military service, I should say, because, we were forced to cut our hairs really short. And, yeah, I did not like it how it appeared in the outside for me. So, yeah, I just like that. Very good, very good.

samples.question: And do you like getting your hair cut?
samples.transcript: Yes, like I mentioned before, I like to get my hair tidied up. And that is why I enjoy my haircut, every month, once a month that I take. So that, yeah, I look refreshed. Okay, very good.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, uh, like I mentioned before, I like to get my hair tidied up. And that's why I enjoy my haircut, uh, every month, once a month that I take. So that, um, yeah, I look refreshed. Okay, very good.

samples.question: So could you describe a time you were sleepy, but you had to stay awake?
samples.transcript: Okay. so this is a very recent situation that I experienced. And this, a time when I was sleepy but I need, I needed to stay awake was, actually this week, this week Monday. Because I had to study overnight for my final exams for the university. I could not sleep for, so I just, I stayed the night. And that is why I was actually very sleepy during the exam period. And I had to study for macroeconomics that I am currently taking right now. And yeah, my methods of trying to stay awake was I ate a lot of coffee and I drank a lot of energy drink, like red bowls. And this is actually very weird. It could sound very weird, but I took two showers in a row. One in warm water, one in cold water. So that my blood flows, my blood circulates a bit better, and then I could keep myself awake. And, yeah, I would say I did not really enjoy this experience because I am a person that sleeps a lot. I like to sleep very very long. Like I, I, people call me like I hibernate every day. But I had to study anyways because my exams period were, my exam periods were in front of me. And that is why, yeah, I did not enjoy this experience but, I probably did a lot of good methods. I probably used a lot of good methods to, stay awake. Okay, all right, yeah, we are up on two minutes there. Okay, perfect, perfect.

samples.question: In your country, is it common to work a lot of overtime or working overnight?
samples.transcript: Oh, that is actually, it used to be very common to work overnight. Yeah. like a few, probably a decade ago. It used to be very normal to work overnight. I personally saw my dad leaving home at 5 a and then he comes back at 12 p or probably the next day morning So yeah that was it seemed very harsh But these days laws have changed and people and yeah Therefore people need to only work at the given hours. that is better. Yeah, it became very better. The situation became better.
samples.transcript_original: Oh, that's actually, um, it used to be very common to work overnight. Yeah. Uh, like a few, probably a decade ago. It used to be very normal to work overnight. Uh I personally saw my dad uh leaving home at 5 a and then he comes back at um 12 p or probably the next day morning Mm So yeah that was it seemed very um harsh But these days uh laws have changed and uh people uh and um yeah Therefore people need to only work at the uh given hours Hmm. That's better. Yeah, it became very better. The situation became better. Hmm.

Yeah, it became very better. The situation became better.

Yeah, right, right. Good, good. yeah.

samples.question: And do you think people who get up early in the morning are more productive than people who get up later?
samples.transcript: I would like to answer this based on my experience. And I personally think people that wake up early in the morning are more productive than people that get up late. in my opinion, when the sun goes, when the sun falls, and it gets nighttime, everything's dark outside, I just feel drowsy. I just feel drowsy and I became lazy. It just feels like, oh, it is time to sleep. And, yeah, that, therefore I do not, I get less productive in those times. But in the morning, the sun has risen and it is all, there is daylight. So that is why people get more energetic. And yeah, I think people will become more productive at that time. Okay, good. Yeah.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I would like to answer this based on my experience. And I personally think people that wake up early in the morning are more productive than people that get up late. It just feels like, uh, oh, it's time to sleep. And, um, yeah, that, therefore I don't, I get less productive in those times. But in the morning, the sun has risen and it's all, there's daylight. So that's why people get more energetic. And yeah, I think people will become more productive at that time. Okay, good. Yeah.

But yeah, I think, I just think younger people, they just have more higher, they just have a higher chance of waking up early and being more energetic in the morning times. Okay, very good, very good.

samples.question: What kind of people lack sleep?
samples.transcript: Never thought of that before. But I think, I would say, night shift workers would lack in sleep. Yeah. Because they wake up at night and then they work during the night time and then they go back to sleep in the morning. Yeah. So their life balances, their time balances actually break down. And, they probably they get confused if they need to sleep right now or if they need to be wake up right, if they need to wake up right now. And yeah, therefore, because of these confusions, they would, lose a lot of time.. I think they would lack a lot of sleep.. Okay, good, good. yeah, and I think there is a lot of debate these days about high school students.
